item.title: The Biden-Harris ATF Has Gun Shops in Its Crosshairs
item.description: The administration has launched a war of attrition against the vendors who make Americans’ Second Amendment rights effective.

item.title: The New York Times Gets the University of Florida Wrong
item.description: The paper of record mischaracterizes recent efforts to reform Florida’s flagship state university.

item.title: Reining In the AI Regulators
item.description: Government should err on the side of caution when it comes to regulatory intervention in nascent industries like AI.

item.title: Say No to the National Suicide Service
item.description: We urge the Parliament of the United Kingdom to reject the Terminally Ill Adults (End of Life) Bill.

item.title: Trump’s Faulty Recess Appointments Stratagem
item.description: The president-elect’s desire to see his agenda advanced expeditiously is understandable, but the constitutional role of advice and consent is fundamen...
